notes:
Major Kling model upgrade — new 3.0 family with native audio generation and longer videos.

• Kling 3.0 Pro & Standard (NEW) — Universal generation for Text-to-Video, Image-to-Video, and Transition Mode in one model. Native audio generation (toggle on/off). Up to 15 seconds. Smart transition mode with 2 images.
• Kling O3 Multi-Cam — Extended duration up to 15 seconds. Audio preservation option.
• Kling O3 VFX — Smart video processing, automatic frame rate conversion, audio preservation.
• Multi-Shot Mode — Consistent characters across scenes, automatic scene transitions.
• Enhanced Voice-to-Text — Upgraded Whisper model, improved accuracy and language support.
• Bug fixes — Story Cutter timestamp accuracy, Brand Voice Assistant memory, clips import.
